affiliation: Developer Evangelist, PayPal Developer Network, PayPal
name: Praveen Alavilli
biography: Praveen Alavilli is the developer evangelist for the PayPal X Developer Network (www.x.com) helping developers monetize their ideas and applications using the PayPal’s Payments Platform. Prior to PayPal, Praveen worked at Amazon.com and AOL as a System Architect designing and building Web Authentication and Identity Systems. Praveen is also an active member of several Internet Identity communities like OpenID and OAuth.
